name: Of Steam and Steel
description:
Jump into action as you fight your way through multiple stages to defeat the enemy robbers. The goal is to get your cargo safely to its destination but it starts to become a problem when there are enemies trying to take down your train.

Once the round starts, the train will start moving down the track. The enemy will continuously attempt to damage sections of the train. If the enemy is successful in destroying a cart, it will begin to leak resources until it is fixed.

The game will continue for a predetermined amount of waves or until the enemy is able to completely destroy the entire train in one round.

Platform: PC

Rating: 13+

Designers:  Phillip Bingham, Jesse Chen, Miguel Donnelly, Hailey Graff, Abigail Hickey, Joe Stone and Warren Wilson.
